sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; function App() { // State to handle modal visibility and form data const [isModalOpen, setIsModalOpen] = useState(false); const [file, setFile] = useState(null); const [googleScholarLink, setGoogleScholarLink] = useState(""); const [userGoal, setUserGoal] = useState(""); // Function to open modal const openModal = () => { setIsModalOpen(true); }; // Function to close modal const closeModal = () => { setIsModalOpen(false); }; // Handle file upload const handleFileUpload = (event) => { const uploadedFile = event.target.files[0]; setFile(uploadedFile); }; // Handle Google Scholar Link Input const handleGoogleScholarChange = (event) => { setGoogleScholarLink(event.target.value); }; // Handle User Goal Dropdown const handleUserGoalChange = (event) => { setUserGoal(event.target.value); }; return (
{/* App Title Banner */}
{/* Logo */} {/* App Name */}

Timeline of You

{/* New 3-Column Image Grid for The American Dream */}
{/* Section Title */}

The Pursuit of Happiness

{/* Image 1 */}

Chasing New Horizons

{/* Image 2 */}

The Power of Habits

{/* Third Banner Image */}

Overcoming Setbacks

{/* New Grid Section - Before Final Call to Action */}

Unlocking Your Potential

{/* Grid Item 1 */}

Building Confidence

{/* Grid Item 2 */}

Developing Skills

{/* Grid Item 3 */}

Achieving Success

{/* Final Call to Action Section */}
{/* Heading for Success Image */}

Shape Your Future, One Step at a Time

{/* Success Image */}
{/* Start Your Journey Button */}
{/* Modal */} {isModalOpen && (

Start Your Journey

Begin your journey by providing the following details.

{/* Google Scholar Link Field */}

Google Scholar Link

Paste the link to your Google Scholar profile.

{/* User Goal Dropdown */}

Your Goal

Select the milestone you are currently working on.

{/* File Upload - Last Item */}

Upload Zip File

{file && (

File uploaded: {file.name}

)}
{/* Grid Heading */}

Important Tips for Document Submission

{/* Grid with 6 Icons and Descriptions */}

Awards and Recognitions

Research and Original Work

Resume and Statement of Purpose

Work Experience and Performance Review

Certification and Skillset

Letter of Recommendations

{/* Modal Footer */}
)}
); } export default App;
